About Us

Who We Are

It started as a vision years ago to put on a race in Corner Canyon on the trails in this beautiful area. Hoping it would bring exposure to the trails in Draper, create a race that would help others by donating the proceeds and designing courses that would be challenging yet accommodate runners of all skill levels.

Come join us next year....
